problem_names: lemma Cons_less_Cons [simp]: "a # x <\<^sub>l b # y \<longleftrightarrow> a < b \<or> a = b \<and> x <\<^sub>l y"
translations:
proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x <\<^sub>l y \<Longrightarrow> x \<noteq> y

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (x, y) \<in> lexord {(u, v). u < v} \<Longrightarrow> x \<noteq> y
lemma Cons_less_Cons [simp]: "a # x <\<^sub>l b # y \<longleftrightarrow> a < b \<or> a = b \<and> x <\<^sub>l y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (a # x <\<^sub>l b # y) = (a < b \<or> a = b \<and> x <\<^sub>l y)
